administrator.description: A user account who is an owner or admin of the group.

archive.description: Archive of the original group (Internet Archive, Archive.is, etc).

attachment.description: A screen capture or exported list of contacts, group members, etc.

creator.description: The user account that created the group.

description.description: A description of the group, channel or community.

embedded-link.description: Link embedded in the group description (potentially malicious).

embedded-safe-link.description: Link embedded in the group description (supposed safe).

group-alias.description: Aliases or previous names of group.

group-name.description: The name of the group, channel or community.

group-type.description: Facebook group type, e.g. general, buy and sell etc.

hashtag.description: Hashtag used to identify or promote the group.

link.description: Original link to the group (supposed harmless).

url.description: Original URL location of the group (potentially malicious).
